name: Could This Mean The End Of Swifty Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
EXAMPLE: "I like camping," said Tom ___.  The answer is INTENTLY. 

Note: The spellings are always correct English, although the pronunciation may not be. The hint will tell the number of words and letters.  Also the beginning and last letters IE: S/LY or S/D.  There are no periods after any of the answers..


QUESTION ONE: "I try to avoid the Tom Hanks movie where he plays the dumb guy," Derek said with ___.
questions.explanation:
Gumption.

	Forrest Gump is the character...Gump-tion.

questions.text: "I'm dressed up as a bear" Ian ___.
questions.explanation:
Inferred.

	Dressed as a bear = In fur.

questions.text: "That'll finally get rid of that German Gold Medal winning figure skater," Petra said ___.
questions.explanation:
Unwittingly.

	No more Katarina Witt? Un-witt-ingly.

questions.text: "My congressman can hang from a tree branch by his primate-like tail," said Charles ___.
"That caped tuna just saved our planet," said Giselle ___.
"But what was the cause of death?" asked Vicky, ___.
questions.explanation:
Wide-eyed & wide eyed.

	What was the cause of death? Why Died?

questions.text: "This College grant keeps me thinking clearly," said Wendy ___.
questions.explanation:
Pellucidly.

	College grant = Pell, sane = lucid.

questions.text: "I'm going to Mr. Hefner's ritual Jewish circumcision," said Karen ___.
questions.explanation:
Hubristically.

	Hefner = Hugh.  Ritual Circumcision = Bris.

questions.text: "Be vewy quiet, I'm hunting wabbits," said Elmer, ___.
"I have written nine Tom Swifty quizzes before, this is my last," said Maskman22 ___.
questions.explanation:
Tentatively.

	If I've written nine then this is my tenth.
